author: Harry Wallop
title: Legoland Windsor: everything you need to know about visiting this summer
text: UK Legoland Windsor: everything you need to know about visiting this summer Information on Legoland Windsor theme park tickets, prices, rides, opening times and hotels, as well as a map, what's new for 2015, and attractions for children Legoland is an entry-level theme park for families with kids below the age of 12, with bucket-loads to keep toddlers happy. Photo: Legoland
